#summary mistyrose is a color keyword defined in CSS and usable wherever a color value is required.
#labels about-css

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSColors Colors] > *mistyrose*

== Value ==

The `mistyrose` color keyword is equivalent to `#ffe4e1`.
